title: Ticket #6633: Add default AMI IDs for all regions we currently support.
description:
We currently upload the annex machinery into public buckets in all four US regions, but we don't have a default AMI in each US region right now, in part because condor_annex doesn't have region-specific default AMIs. This should be fixed.

Additionally -- if it make implementation sense -- making the rest of the configuration region-specific would be a big win. Otherwise that'll become is own ticket. (This seems like it should be easy -- set the localname to the region (replacing dashes with underscores) when initializing the param system -- but who knows.) [=get_mySubSystem()->setLocalName()=]
remarks:
2018-Mar-30 15:13:38 by tlmiller:
Also need to change -setup to write the keyfile, if any (new) to a name modified by the region, so we don't lose it if we set up another region, e.g., HTCondorAnnex-KeyPair.us-west-1.pem.
